data.text: A big day tomorrow as markets digest Russia/Ukraine info. Brinksmanship or conflict? WTI popping to $94/bbl today. Going out on a limb here..i'm more inclined to fade (than buy) this war talk when it comes to energy stocks. Memories of Gulf War - stocks peaked near invasion date.

@guestiest @lultoto @hasanthehun Even if Putin de-escalates, he has invaded Ukraine. The contested regions are parts of Ukraine. Russian military operations within these borders unsanctioned is called an invasion. I imagine Putin's hope is to annex these territories and then enter into de-escalation talks.
The best case scenario for the greater good is that Ukraine concedes the two territories without fighting back. If they choose to fight there will be a full scale invasion from Russia.
